xml.data:
Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 1 Khandhasaṃyutta » 1.3 Uparipaṇṇāsaka » 1.3.1 Antavagga
1.3.1.5 Samaṇasutta
Khandhasaṃyutta
Uparipaṇṇāsaka
Antavagga
Samaṇasutta
107.
666Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Pañcime, bhikkhave, upādānakkhandhā. Katame pañca? Seyyathidaṃ—  rūpupādānakkhandho…pe…  viññāṇupādānakkhandho. Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti…pe…  pajānanti, sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
667Pañcamaṃ.
